name: Casey's Room
description:
Casey's Room is a 2-Player multiplayer game.

One of the players tries to remember the objects in the room.
The other player can move up to 5 items, which the first player needs to correctly guess afterwards. Don't peek!

Some objects are trapped (shown in the pause screen), and need to be ignored!

Credits:

Kerstin Hofer

Maximilian Tomio

Jeannette Schwalm

Florian Bayer

Jan Mikusch
